description: Indulge your puzzle-solving passion with Tetris Mania! With three new game modes, Tetris Mania puts a new spin on the compelling original you know and love. Use gravity in Cascade mode to gain an avalanche of points, join atomic blocks in Fusion mode to blast to the next level, and dig through increasingly high stacks of blocks in Sticky mode in order to clear the bottom line. Engage in block-blasting fun wherever you are with new Tetris Mania.
